dashboard.label: Crime Prediction Model Per LSOA using Ridge Algorithm

search.query: | inputlookup LSOA_Size.csv | rename lsoa as Codes | append [| inputlookup Total_Notifiable_Offences.csv ] | append [| inputlookup aged_44.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_15.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_29.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_64.csv ] | append [| inputlookup ages_65plus.csv ] | append [| inputlookup all_ages.csv ] | append [| inputlookup child_poverty_percent.csv ] | append [| inputlookup happiness_coefficient.csv ] | append [| inputlookup household_income.csv | rename Code as Codes ] | append [| inputlookup school_absence.csv] | stats values(*) as * by Codes | where isnotnull(size) | eval Name=coalesce(Name,Names) | fields - Names *_2012 Codes| apply predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_ridge_FieldSelector_0 | apply "predict_total_crime_per_lsoa_ridge" | `regressionstatistics("total_notifiable_offences_now", "predicted(total_notifiable_offences_now)")` | fields rSquared
